name: NotAlone Inc.
description:
Congratulations [Insert name here],

You are the newest member of NotAlone Incorporated! 

The company for the ghosts, by the ghosts. 

Our department is specialized in instilling fear and depression to humans, destined to clients that seek vengeance, or just warn a relative. Your role, as a Fear Planner, is to guide our field officiers to successfully achieve the desired result. Don't worry, for your first missions, you will be assigned a manager to help you. 

Welcome to the team, [Insert name here]!

NotAlone Incorporated, because your are not alone... And neither are they.

Controls
  • Left click -> Select ghost (Or use the numbered keys)
  • Right click -> Move ghost
  • E -> Haunt item
  • Middle mouse button / W, A, S, D -> Move the camera
  • Scrollwheel -> Zoom in and out
Credits

Maxime  "Vylozeny" Fieffé -> Programming / Sound Design / Voice Acting

Loïc  "MetalFox Dioxymore" Parra -> Programming / Music / Level Design

Guillaume  "Youhou" Sarramegna -> Additional Level Design

Kenney.nl -> 3D Models

Mixamo -> Animations

Additional Models -> Chris Nolet

Additional Textures -> LowlyPoly / YAH Agency

Known Issues

There seem to have some hitboxes shenanigans if you play the game in fullscreen on Firefox. 

It works as intended on Chrome or on the Windows build if you encounter this problem.

If all the characters get stuck in one spot, you can refresh the page, go to the main menu and use the "continue" button to restart the level, sorry about that!

Can't get enough of that OST?
